languages.text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Позволяет в течение одного хода использовать обе способности одного поста.
Если одна или обе способности еще восстанавливаются, время восстановления снижается на 1 ход.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Allows to use both abilities of one selected post for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time reduces by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Allows the use of both abilities of one selected post for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Позволяет в течение одного хода использовать обе способности одного поста.
Если одна или обе способности еще восстанавливаются, время восстановления снижается на 1 ход.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

Ermöglicht den Einsatz beider Fähigkeiten eines ausgewählten {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Postens{/g} für einen Zug.
Befinden sich eine oder beide Fähigkeiten in der Abklingzeit, wird diese um −1 Zug verkürzt.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Ermöglicht den Einsatz beider {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} eines ausgewählten {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} für einen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.
Befinden sich eine oder beide Fähigkeiten in der {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}, wird diese um −1 Zug reduziert.
<indent=5 %>Abklingzeit: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Permet d'utiliser les deux capacités d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} sélectionné pendant un tour.
Si l'une des capacités (ou les deux) est en cours de recharge, son temps de recharge est réduit de 1 tour.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Permet d'utiliser les deux {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} sélectionné pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Si l'une des capacités (ou les deux) est en cours de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g}, son délai de récupération est réduit de -1 tour.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
您可以在一个回合中，使用所选{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}的全部两项能力。
如果其中一项或两项能力处于冷却状态，则冷却时间缩短一轮。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
您可以在一个回合中，使用所选{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}的全部两项能力。
如果其中一项或两项能力处于冷却状态，则冷却时间缩短一轮。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
Permite usar las dos capacidades del {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} elegido en un mismo turno.
Si una o ambas capacidades se encuentran en tiempo de recuperación, la recuperación se adelanta 1 turno.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Permite usar las dos {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} elegido en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Si una o ambas capacidades se encuentran en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g}, la recuperación se adelanta 1 turno.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
1ターンの間、選択した{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}役職{/g}の両アビリティを使用可能にする。
もし、片方または両方のアビリティがクールダウン中の場合、そのクールダウン時間が-1ターン短縮される。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>(1～3)</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Allows the use of both abilities of one selected {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} for one turn.
If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
1ターンの間、選択した{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}役職{/g}の両アビリティを使用可能にする。
もし、片方または両方のアビリティがクールダウン中の場合、そのクールダウン時間が-1ターン短縮される。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>(1～3)</u>ラウンド。</indent>

languages.text:
Seçilen bir {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}mevkinin{/g} bir tur içinde iki kabiliyetinin de kullanılmasına olanak tanır.
Kabiliyetlerden biri veya her ikisi de dolum süresindeyse dolum süreleri 1 tur azalır.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 3)</u> raunt.</indent>
languages.original_text:

If one or both abilities are on cooldown, their cooldown time is reduced by −1 turn.
